pages.text: For any hard-to-reach places that I can't light up, I can use a $(thing)glaretorch$(); throwable and significantly brighter than the standard torch, albeit with a much more resource intensive and involved process.

There also exist two other variants: the $(thing)Aetherial glaretorch$() and the $(thing)End glaretorch$(). I've no clue how to replicate these; the material they're made of seems to be beyond my knowledge. They seem to be fairly commonplace within chests from their respective realms, though, so I can always look for more that way.$(br2)However, I can make one of these bad boys:

These are the ultimate in lighting, illuminating a massive area. However, these require even more advanced and hard-to-get materials than the standard glaretorch, so I shouldn't expect to be making too many of these.
